src.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT LoanGuid FROM app.TextOptIn 
WHERE CellPhone = '[Get:CCP]' )
BEGIN
select OptIn,

CASE

When OptIn IS NULL or OptIn = '' Then 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:[LOSM:CobOptInPopUp]}); return false();'
When OptIn IS NOT NULL or OptIn <> '' Then 'return false();'
Else 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:[LOSM:CobOptInPopUp]}); return false();'
END AS Click
from app.TextOptIn
where LoanGuid = '[Get:LG]' and CellPhone = '[Get:CCP]'

END
ELSE
BEGIN

select 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:[LOSM:CobOptInPopUp]}); return false();' AS Click
END
